jd: HiHope you are doing good!!Please find the below requirement and reply to me back with updated resume asap. Position: .Net Technical Lead with GCP Location: Remote Must Have's: 14 yrs experience of these core skills: GCP Google Cloud Platform and .Net Retail Order Mgmt 2 -3 yrs experience Google Cloud Spanner (database) Responsibilities: Lead the planning and execution of multiple projects, ensuring alignment with company goals and objectives. Oversee the development and implementation of solutions using Google Cloud Spanner, GCP, and .Net Core technologies. Provide technical guidance and support to the project team to ensure high quality deliverables. Coordinate with cross functional teams to ensure seamless integration and delivery of project components. Monitor project progress, identify risks, and implement mitigation strategies to ensure timely completion. Develop and maintain project documentation, including project plans, status reports, and risk management plans. Facilitate communication between stakeholders to ensure clear understanding of project requirements and expectations. Conduct regular project reviews and provide updates to senior management on project status and performance. Ensure compliance with company policies, procedures, and standards throughout the project lifecycle. Foster a collaborative and inclusive team environment to drive innovation and continuous improvement. Utilize data driven insights to make informed decisions and optimize project outcomes. Manage project budgets, ensuring efficient allocation of resources and adherence to financial constraints. Drive the adoption of best practices and emerging technologies to enhance project delivery and performance. Qualifications: Possess a deep understanding of Google Cloud Spanner, GCP, and .Net Core technologies. Demonstrate strong project management skills with a proven track record of successful project delivery. Exhibit excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with diverse teams. Show proficiency in risk management and problem solving techniques. Have experience in developing and maintaining comprehensive project documentation.
